mapper.update:
UPDATE bill_balance
bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
bill_name = #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
buyer_no = #{buyerNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=CHAR},
saler_no = #{salerNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
saler_name = #{salerName,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_unit_no = #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_unit_name = #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=CHAR},
category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=CHAR},
balance_date = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=DATE},
balance_start_date = #{balanceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
balance_end_date = #{balanceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
entry_amount = #{entryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deduction_amount = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance_amount = #{balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
has_balance_amount = #{hasBalanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_qty = #{outQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
entry_qty = #{entryQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
return_qty = #{returnQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deduction_qty = #{deductionQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
balance_qty = #{balanceQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ask_payment_no =#{askPaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_apply_no =#{invoiceApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_no =#{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_user_defined =#{isUserDefined,jdbcType=INTEGER}
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

UPDATE bill_balance SET bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, bill_name = #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, buyer_no = #{buyerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=CHAR}, saler_no = #{salerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, saler_name = #{salerName,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_unit_no = #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_unit_name = #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=CHAR}, category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, balance_date = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, balance_start_date = #{balanceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, balance_end_date = #{balanceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, entry_amount = #{entryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deduction_amount = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance_amount = #{balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, has_balance_amount = #{hasBalanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_qty= #{outQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entry_qty=#{entryQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_qty= #{returnQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deduction_qty= #{deductionQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balance_qty= #{balanceQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ask_payment_no= #{askPaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_apply_no= #{invoiceApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_no= #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_user_defined =#{isUserDefined,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update bill_balance SET status = #{params.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, auditor = #{params.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{params.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE bill_no = #{params.billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUPPLIER_NO SALER_NO,BUYER_NO BUYER_NO,SUM(RECEIVE_QTY) ENTRY_QTY,SUM(RECEIVE_QTY * COST) ENTRY_AMOUNT,
SUM(RECEIVE_QTY * COST) - IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(DEDUCTION_AMOUNT) FROM OTHER_DEDUCTION OD WHERE 1 = 1
AND OD.BALANCE_NO IS NULL AND OD.BALANCE_TYPE = '6' GROUP BY OD.SALER_NO, OD.BUYER_NO), 0 ) BALANCE_AMOUNT,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(DEDUCTION_AMOUNT) FROM OTHER_DEDUCTION OD WHERE 1=1
AND OD.BALANCE_NO IS NULL AND OD.BALANCE_TYPE = '6' GROUP BY OD.SALER_NO, OD.BUYER_NO),0) DEDUCTION_AMOUNT,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(DEDUCTION_QTY) FROM OTHER_DEDUCTION OD WHERE 1 = 1
AND OD.BALANCE_NO IS NULL AND OD.BALANCE_TYPE = '6' GROUP BY OD.SALER_NO, OD.BUYER_NO), 0 ) DEDUCTION_QTY,
SUM(RECEIVE_QTY) BALANCE_QTY FROM BILL_BUY_BALANCE WHERE 1 = 1 AND BILL_TYPE='1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33','12','34') AND BALANCE_NO IS NULL
and supplier_no = #{salerNo}
and buyer_no = #{buyerNo}
and brand_no in (${brandNo})
and receive_date >= #{balanceStartDate}
and receive_date <= #{balanceEndDate}
GROUP BY SUPPLIER_NO,BUYER_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE bill_buy_balance SET balance_no = #{params.balanceNo} WHERE 1 = 1 AND bill_type='1304' AND balance_no IS NULL AND id=#{params.id}
UPDATE bill_buy_balance SET balance_no = NULL WHERE balance_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT '合计' bill_no, IFNULL(SUM(B.entry_qty), 0) entry_qty, IFNULL(SUM(B.entry_amount), 0) entry_amount, IFNULL(SUM(B.deduction_amount), 0) deduction_amount, IFNULL(SUM(B.return_amount), 0) return_amount, IFNULL(SUM(B.balance_amount), 0) balance_amount FROM bill_balance B WHERE 1=1

SELECT SALER_NO AS SALER_NO, SALER_NAME AS SALER_NAME, BUYER_NO AS BUYER_NO, BUYER_NAME AS BUYER_NAME, BRAND_UNIT_NO AS BRAND_UNIT_NO, BRAND_UNIT_NAME AS BRAND_UNIT_NAME, SUM(ENTRY_QTY) ENTRY_QTY, SUM(ENTRY_AMOUNT) ENTRY_AMOUNT, SUM(DEDUCTION_QTY) DEDUCTION_QTY, SUM(DEDUCTION_AMOUNT) DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, SUM(BALANCE_QTY) BALANCE_QTY, SUM(ENTRY_AMOUNT)-SUM(DEDUCTION_AMOUNT) BALANCE_AMOUNT FROM (SELECT SALER_NO AS SALER_NO, SALER_NAME AS SALER_NAME, BUYER_NO AS BUYER_NO, BUYER_NAME AS BUYER_NAME, BRAND_UNIT_NO AS BRAND_UNIT_NO, BRAND_UNIT_NAME AS BRAND_UNIT_NAME, RECEIVE_QTY AS ENTRY_QTY, 0 AS DEDUCTION_QTY, 0 AS DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, IFNULL(RECEIVE_QTY * COST, 0) AS ENTRY_AMOUNT, RECEIVE_QTY AS BALANCE_QTY FROM BILL_BUY_BALANCE WHERE 1 = 1
AND BALANCE_NO IS NULL AND BILL_TYPE = '1304' AND BIZ_TYPE IN ('2', '33', '12', '34') UNION ALL SELECT SALER_NO AS SALER_NO, SALER_NAME AS SALER_NAME, BUYER_NO AS BUYER_NO, BUYER_NAME AS BUYER_NAME, D.BRAND_UNIT_NO AS BRAND_UNIT_NO, D.NAME AS BRAND_UNIT_NAME, 0 AS ENTRY_QTY, DEDUCTION_QTY DEDUCTION_QTY, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, 0 AS ENTRY_AMOUNT, 0 AS BALANCE_QTY FROM OTHER_DEDUCTION OD LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON B.BRAND_NO = OD.BRAND_NO LEFT JOIN BRAND_UNIT D ON B.SYS_NO = D.BRAND_UNIT_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND OD.BALANCE_NO IS NULL AND OD.BALANCE_TYPE = '6') AREA_SELF GROUP BY SALER_NO, BUYER_NO, BRAND_UNIT_NO
